intro: Psychotria ambongensis, commonly known as the Ambongensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia, particularly Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
